channel.title: Kierkegaard on Vishvas's English lit
channel.description: Recent content in Kierkegaard on Vishvas's English lit

item.title: Pleasure vs possibility
item.description: If you marry, you will regret it; if you do not marry, you will also regret it; if you marry or if you do not marry, you will regret both; whether you marry or you do not marry, you will regret both. Laugh at the world’s follies, you will regret it; weep over them, you will also regret it; if you laugh at the world’s follies or if you weep over them, you will regret both; whether you laugh at the world’s follies or you weep over them, you will regret both.
